metadata.synopsis: The steel watch foundry explodes, and the players escape by the skin of their teeth.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Aopen ReConuse oe LOW_GiveBombGo to -1935; -7; 206Kill mindflayerInteract with S_LOW_Control_Computer_db465637-8fe5-435d-adc0-34528f47a724choose to place the bomb

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player reacts to ticking bomb, looks around nervously before running off screen to get to safety

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players party bursts through the doors of the Foundry. They turn and see an explosion as the Foundry collapse - they escaped just in time.
